messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] planning in advance (Danielle)
messages.messageBody:
OMG< We'll never get to meet!! I'm like that.
***********
By the same token, if we all
wake up and feel like going somewhere, I want to be able to go with that
spontaneous energy. I don't plan to grocery shop or clean or anything on
any particular day. That kind of scheduling just brings out the rebel in
me. *g*
*******
Maybe there is hope. let's just hook up spontaneously one day!! email me in
the am and if we aren't going to a 'planned by someone else event' we'll
meet
you!!

Elissa Jill
=====================

*lol* See, that's what I miss most about my friend in Albuquerque. We
could call each other up and say, "Hey, are you guys up for the park/
museum/ whatever?" And we'd meet. It was great. *sigh* No one like that
here. Folks are way too scheduled for that kind of spontaneous outing.
They either have something to do, or they've had so many somethings to
do that they just want to stay home.

--Danielle

http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] planning in advance (Danielle)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/30/2004 3:22:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: ====Do you try and plan a few activities for the week or
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/30/2004 3:22:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
====Do you try and plan a few activities for the week or month?===

I'm not much of a planner, honestly. If others are involved, we
plan--4-H, park days, LLL, stuff like that. Those are on the schedule.
But most of our life tends to be much more organic than that. I don't
like to feel over-scheduled; I don't want to feel obligated to do
something if our day just doesn't match up.
**********
OMG< We'll never get to meet!! I'm like that.
***********
By the same token, if we all
wake up and feel like going somewhere, I want to be able to go with that
spontaneous energy. I don't plan to grocery shop or clean or anything on
any particular day. That kind of scheduling just brings out the rebel in
me. *g*
*******
Maybe there is hope. let's just hook up spontaneously one day!! email me in
the am and if we aren't going to a 'planned by someone else event' we'll meet
you!!

Elissa Jill

Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you;
They're supposed to help you discover who you are.
~Bernice Johnson Reagon


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
